website_summaries.verdict: A great basic sandal that will support you for many years to come.
pros: Durable shoes that stand up to many years of wear
Neutral color that goes with any outfit
cons: No strap to adjust sandal width

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality -- No longer a Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These are so cheaply made they probably will not last a month. I am sending mine back. When they were made in Central Europe, they were high quality and would last a couple of years. Now that they are made in China, I say, DO NOT BOTHER!!! They have no arch support, as the old ones did. They are also at least 1/8 " thinner in depth than they used to be.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald H. Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Easy on/off outdoor slide
customer_reviews.text: I never had the much-lauded "original" Adilette's but these are stellar. Pros: -Made in Italy. I know this isn't a guarantee of quality but I generally prefer footwear made in Italy vs Asia -Cheap enough to pick up a few pairs -Easy to slip on and off -Smooth footbed doesn't squeak as I walk Cons: -It'd be nice if the felt liner under the cross-strap wrapped around a little bit over the edges, especially the front edge. I can feel the vinyl material sort of dig into the tops of my toes. It doesn't bother me but we'll see how it is after extended wearing.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hung

customer_reviews.title: If it ain't broke...
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume cheaper production and higher profit is why adidas changed my most favorite slide ever. The new version is stiff and fits a bit smaller. Time to find a new slide after 15 years of the old Adilettes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R.

customer_reviews.title: Older version better
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an old pair I've had for years as house shoes. The older version was better. As others have written, the older version had fabric on the underside of the strap and the new design does not. Plus, after a week they still smell like chemicals. I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Best classic slides ever.
customer_reviews.text: These slides are the ultimate classic. Super comfortable and great for throwing on quickly. Had to exchange mine for a size up because they run a little bit small. Other than that, BUY THESE. Everyone should have a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Sligh

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes but I like these a little large ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes but I like these a little large for comfort and ease of slipping on/off. I am returning them for larger size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them, have been wearing same ones for 20+ years!
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I was able to find the same ones. Love them, nothing comes even close. I wear them as soon as I get home.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Olson

customer_reviews.title: Cuts into the top of my foot
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are functional but not comfortable. There's stitching at the edges of the strap that goes over the foot, and the stitching on my right foot cuts sharply into the top of my foot. I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve from Boston

customer_reviews.title: A bit stiff
customer_reviews.text: My son and I each have a pair of these. I ordered mine one size smaller in the men's. This way, they would fit me as a woman. I like mine. But my son feels like his are too stiff. Overall, a good value though.
customer_reviews.author: KimCon

customer_reviews.title: Nothing good about these...
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like these. They feel very, very bulky. Someone else mentioned that they are one size too small, but I think mine actually feel bigger than what they should be. Also, I bought it somewhere else and it said that these are good shower sandals. Not at all - it takes them more than a day to dry up even in winter when it is very dry in my home...
customer_reviews.author: Lord Dima

customer_reviews.title: 10 Times BETTER than hideous Birkenstocks....
customer_reviews.text: This is about the only house/pool slipper suitable for wearing outside.....with socks, please. The Birkenstock fit without the Tree Hugger ugliness, is a winner in my book. Insole is smooth and contoured, which does not collect years of foot funk like many other "orthopaedic" sandals. Make sure you only buy the ones Made in Italy. These are the ones that last well over 10 years of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: Velocipede

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE. They are FAKES! Sizing ...
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE. They are FAKES! Sizing is way too small and they are NOT originals! Waiting for my refund NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one of all time best sandals...period
customer_reviews.text: Owned a pair for 6 years. I'm buying new ones right now online because I love them so much! I plan on wearing this model for the rest of my life :))
customer_reviews.author: onix

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Adilette Slide Sandal
product_meta.description:
The Adidas adilette is the sport slide that started it all. Inspired by that timeless look from 1972, these men's sandals are easy-to-wear and come in seasonal pastel colors.

Originally launched in 1972 to the joy of grateful feet everywhere, the adilette is the most famous aprés-sport slide on the market today.

adidas is a name that stands for excellence in all sectors of sport around the globe. The vision of company founder Adolf Dassler has become a reality, and his corporate philosophy has been the guiding principle for successor generations. The idea was as simple as it was brilliant: to provide every athlete with the best possible equipment. It all began in 1920, when Adi Dassler made his first shoes using the few materials available after the First World War. Today, the adidas product range extends from shoes, apparel, and accessories for basketball, soccer, fitness and training to adventure, trail and golf.

See more
